summary: The "Creidt Real Estate Exchange" (CRX-E) is a new fund allocation platform that allows users to invest in long-term and short-term real estate-related assets. The CRX-E is a well-established vehicle for long-term and short-term investments into real estate, similar to traditional mutual funds. It has also launched a "Credit Real Estate Exchange" target debt fund with a 40% target allocation to alternative assets.
